text: Pxr Filmic Tone Mapper Display Filter
Pxr Filmic Tone Mapper Display Filter shader
Represents the Pxr Filmic Tone Mapper Display Filter shader (PxrFilmicToneMapperDisplayFilter) for RenderMan’s RIS rendering mode.
Please see the Users' Guide section of the RenderMan Documentation for details.
